SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameModel
public class Game extends Object implements GameModel
Class to handle game(s). A game has a unique alphanumeric id and a non-variable number of players.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Game.Deserializer
    Deserializer used to reload a game from a JSON file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String id, int numPlayers)
      Creates a game, initializing its ID as well as its number of players to a chosen value, its other attributes are set to standard values.
      Parameters:
      id - The game's ID.
      numPlayers - The number of players expected inside the game.

    • Game

      private Game(String id, int numPlayers, String activePlayer, String startingPlayer, List<String> winnerUsernames, ObjectiveCardsDeck objectiveCardsDeck, StarterCardsDeck starterCardsDeck, GoldCardsDeck goldCardsDeck, ResourceCardsDeck resourceCardsDeck, ObjectiveCard[] commonObjectiveCards, PlayableCard[] commonGoldCards, PlayableCard[] commonResourceCards, GameState state, Map<String,Player> players, List<PlayerColor> availableColors, List<String> turnOrder)
      Constructs a new game with all the given attributes. Used for deserializing from JSON.
      Parameters:
      id - The game's id.
      numPlayers - The number of players expected in this game.
      activePlayer - The currently active player in this game.
      startingPlayer - The starting player for this game.
      winnerUsernames - The list of players who have won this game.
      objectiveCardsDeck - The deck of objective cards used for this game.
      starterCardsDeck - The deck of starter cards used for this game.
      goldCardsDeck - The deck of gold cards used for this game.
      resourceCardsDeck - The deck of resource cards used for this game.
      commonObjectiveCards - The common objectives for this game.
      commonGoldCards - The common gold cards from which the players can choose to draw from.
      commonResourceCards - The common resource cards from which the players can choose to draw from.
      state - The game's state.
      players - The players for this game.
      availableColors - The currently available colors from which players can choose.
      turnOrder - The order in which players play in this game.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Specified by:
      getId in interface GameModel
      Returns:
      The game's ID.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Adds a new player into the game. The number of players cannot exceed numPlayers.
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game is already full, if the game has already started, or if there is already a player with the same username present in the game.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String username) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Removes a player from the game. This method can only be used in the initial phase of the game.
      Specified by:
      removePlayer in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to be removed. If a player with the given username does not exist, this method does nothing.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if an attempt was made to remove a player from a game which has already started.

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Initializes the game by drawing the common gold and resource cards, and distributing the starter cards to the players.
      Specified by:
      initializeGame in interface GameModel
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game was already initialized, or if the game hasn't reached the required number of players.

    • drawCommonCards

      private void drawCommonCards()
      Draws two gold cards and two resource cards. The players can see them and choose to draw them.

    • drawStarterCards

      private void drawStarterCards()
      Draws numPlayers starter cards and gives one to each player.

    • setPlayerStarterSide

      public void setPlayerStarterSide(String username, SideType side) throws UnexpectedActionException, NoStarterCardException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Lets the player choose the side of their starter card. It can be either front or back.
      Specified by:
      setPlayerStarterSide in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      side - The card's side.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has already started, hence all players should have already chosen their starter card side.
      NoStarterCardException

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(String username, PlayerColor color) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Sets the color of a player.
      Specified by:
      setPlayerColor in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      color - The color a player chose.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has already started, hence all the players should have already chosen their color, or if the given color has already been chosen by another player.

      Starts the game by choosing the starting player and distributing the resource and gold cards.
      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String username, PlayableCard placedCard, SideType side, Position newCardPos) throws IllegalMoveException, UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Lets a player place a card.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      placedCard - The card the player wants to place.
      side - The chosen card's side.
      newCardPos - The position of the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the player made an illegal move.
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if this method is called before the game has been started.

    • drawCard

      public PlayableCard drawCard(String username, DrawType drawType) throws UnexpectedActionException, IllegalMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Lets the player draw a card. A card can be drawn from the deck or from the currently visible cards. If the card is drawn from one of the common cards, it is replaced with a card of the same type if available. If a card of the same type is not available, it is replaced with a card of the other type.
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface GameModel
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      drawType - The place a player wants to draw a card from.
      Returns:
      The drawn card.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if this method is called before the game has been started.
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if a draw is attempted from an empty deck, or from an empty common card slot.

    • advanceTurn

      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Advances the turn to the next player.
      Specified by:
      advanceTurn in interface GameModel
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game not started yet, or if it has already ended.

    • evaluateObjectivePoints

      private void evaluateObjectivePoints()

    • triggerFinalRound

      public void triggerFinalRound() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Triggers the game to enter the final round, if it is ready to do so; otherwise, this method does nothing.
      Specified by:
      triggerFinalRound in interface GameModel
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has not started yet, or if it has already ended.

    • endGame

      public void endGame() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Description copied from interface: GameModel
      Ends the current game and evaluates the objective points of the players. Then, it selects a winner.
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface GameModel
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has not yet entered its final round, or if it has already ended.
